subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Kingdoms in Rajasthan and their Caps
question_en: Which kingdom did Maharana Pratap belong to and what was his capital?
question_hi: महाराज महाराज प्रतिपाद के किस समर्थन में थे और उनके राजधानी क्या था ?
explanation_en: Maharana Pratap belonged to the Mewar kingdom and his capital was Jaipur.
explanation_hi: महाराज प्रतिपाद के मेवार समर्थन मैं के राजधानी क्या थी ?
